All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    This class contains all the methods and attributes of the Account and therefore is responsible for handling all the details related to a user on the Social Media Platform.
    AccountIDNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use an account ID that does not exit in the system.
    BadSocialMedia
    BadSocialMedia is a minimally compiling, but non-functioning implementor of the SocialMediaPlatform interface.
    Comment
    This class consists of the specific methods and attributes of a Comment, some of the other methods and attributes of a Comment are inheritted from a Post.
    Endorsement
    This class consists of the specific methods and attributes of a Endorsement, some of the other methods and attributes of a Endorsement are inheritted from a Post.
    HandleNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use an account handle that does not exit in the system.
    IllegalHandleException
    Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle already in use in the system.
    InvalidHandleException
    Thrown when attempting to assign an account handle empty or having more than the system limit of characters.
    InvalidPostException
    Thrown when attempting to create a post which the message is empty or has more characters than the system's limit.
    MiniSocialMediaPlatform
    MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface.
    NotActionablePostException
    Thrown when attempting to act upon an not-actionable post.
    Post
    This class consists of the methods and attributes of a Post and therefore is responsible for all the details regarding a Post and due to how a Comment and Endorsement inherit from Post it is respinsible for some methods ad details of a a Comment and Endorsement.
    PostIDNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use a post ID that does not exit in the system.
    SocialMedia
    This class is am implimetation of the SocialMediaPlatform interface which extends the MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface.
    SocialMediaPlatform
    SocialMediaPlatform interface.
